title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change right away.  Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: Observe that when modifying the font size of a label, the label height remains the same.
EB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label height should adjust to be justified with the font size.
